body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping         Wuksachi Lodge    Lodging Four lodges operate within Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks, including two that are open year-round.        NPS/Kirke Wrench   Camping Campgrounds are located throughout these parks, from the foothills to the sequoia groves and along the floor of Kings Canyon.          Restaurants Restaurants, delis, or snack bars can be found in most areas of the parks in summer. In winter, check at park lodges for dining options.        Alison Taggart-Barone  Picnic Areas  Enjoy a meal outdoors! Choose a large picnic area for a family barbecue or a single table at the river's edge.
title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Eating & Sleeping
